Alas, there is nothing to restore.\nTry to create a new copy by clicking on the plus sign at the bottom.
Deleted! The data can only contain letters of the English alphabet and numbers. Please, enter data!
EMail Password Name Login Registration Not yet used? Sign up! Already registered? Log in!
Automatic copy Manual copy
Swage Recovery Multifunction program for creating backups of your device Copy contacts We create a copy of all your contacts, do not worry, they will be securely stored Copy messages Copies of your messages safely store them until the next recovery
Expect… Loading… Done Log in… Registering…
Getting ready to start Close the other applications on your device to safely start archiving data Messaging Archiving Save a copy of your SMS messages from your device to the archive Back up contacts Save a copy of your contacts from your device to the archive Backup call log Save a copy of your call log from the device to the archive Loading data Upload your data to a secure location of our cloud
Restore Messages Restore copies of your SMS messages from the archive to the device Contacts Recovery Restore copy your contacts from the archive to the device Restore call log Restore the copy of your call log from file to the device Loading data download your data from our store on your device
Close applications To continue and start the backup operation should close all the conflicting application to prevent possible loss of data. Are you ready? " Continue Cancel Restore copy To continue and start the recovery operation backup, click Continue, or Cancel Continue Cancel Delete copy To continue and start operation remove the backup, click Continue, or Cancel Continue Cancel Incorrect data Apparently, you have entered incorrect data to your account.\nTry again, Continue Connection error There was a communication error with the server. This error could be caused by several factors, such as lack of Internet connection, any problems on the server. Continue
